bwaMapReads.string_process:
process bwaMapReads {
        
        cpus = 4
        memory = 16.GB
        time = '3h'
        publishDir "${params.outdir}" 
        tag "$sampleId"
    
        input:
            path ref from params.ref
            path bwaidx from bwaidx_ch.collect()
            tuple val(sampleId), path(reads) from reads_ch
    
        output:
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}.sam") into sam_ch
    
        script:
        readGroup = "@RG\\tID:${sampleId}\\tSM:${sampleId}\\tPL:ILLUMINA\\tLB:lib1\\tPU:u"
        """
        module load bwa/0.7.17
    
        bwa mem -R \"${readGroup}\" -t 24 ${ref} ${reads} > ${sampleId}.sam
        """
    }
bwaMapReads.string_script:
readGroup = "@RG\\tID:${sampleId}\\tSM:${sampleId}\\tPL:ILLUMINA\\tLB:lib1\\tPU:u"
        """
        module load bwa/0.7.17
    
        bwa mem -R \"${readGroup}\" -t 24 ${ref} ${reads} > ${sampleId}.sam
        """

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

samtoolsSort.string_process:
process samtoolsSort {
        
        cpus = 1
        memory = 20.GB
        time = '1h'
        publishDir "${params.outdir}" 
        tag "sam"
    
        input:
            path sam from sam_ch
                                                                                
        output:
            path "*_sorted.bam"
    
        script:
        """
        module load samtools/1.9
    
        samtools sort \
            -o ${sam}_sorted.bam \
            -O bam \
            ${sam} 
        """
    }
samtoolsSort.string_script:
"""
        module load samtools/1.9
    
        samtools sort \
            -o ${sam}_sorted.bam \
            -O bam \
            ${sam} 
        """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

markDuplicates.string_process:
process markDuplicates {
        
        cpus = 1
        memory = 32.GB
        time = '2h'
        publishDir "${params.outdir}" 
        tag "${bam}"
    
        input:
            path bam from sortedbam_ch

        output:
            path "*_marked_dups.bam"
            path "*_marked_dups_metrics.txt" 
            path "*_marked_dups.bai"
 
        script:
        """
        module load picard/2.7.1 
    
        picard MarkDuplicates \
            I=${bam} \
            O=${bam}_marked_dups.bam \
            M=${bam}_marked_dups_metrics.txt \
            CREATE_INDEX=true
        """
    }
markDuplicates.string_script:
"""
        module load picard/2.7.1 
    
        picard MarkDuplicates \
            I=${bam} \
            O=${bam}_marked_dups.bam \
            M=${bam}_marked_dups_metrics.txt \
            CREATE_INDEX=true
        """

tools_dico.name: Picard
tools_dico.description: A set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data in formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF. Available as a standalone program or within the GATK4 program.

realignerTargetCreator.string_process:
process realignerTargetCreator {
        
        cpus = 1
        memory = 8.GB
        time = '1h'
        publishDir "${params.outdir}" 
        tag "$sampleId"
    
        input:
            path ref  from params.ref
            path fai  from params.fai 
            path dict from params.dict
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles) from markedbam_ch

        output:
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_target_intervals.list")
 
        script:
                                                                                      
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')        
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T RealignerTargetCreator \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -o ${sampleId}_target_intervals.list        
        """
    }
realignerTargetCreator.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')        
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T RealignerTargetCreator \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -o ${sampleId}_target_intervals.list        
        """

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

indelRealigner.string_process:
process indelRealigner {

        cpus = 2
        memory = 14.GB
        time = '5h'
        publishDir "${params.outdir}"
        tag "$sampleId"

        input:                                                                      
            path ref  from params.ref                                               
            path fai  from params.fai                                               
            path dict from params.dict                                              
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles), path(intervals) from realigntargets_ch
        
        output:
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_realigned.bam") 
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_realigned.bai") 

        script:                                                                     
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')             
        """                                                                         
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                                      
                                                                                    
        gatk -T IndelRealigner \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -targetIntervals ${intervals} \
             -o ${sampleId}_realigned.bam 
        """                                                                         
    }
indelRealigner.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')             
        """                                                                         
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                                      
                                                                                    
        gatk -T IndelRealigner \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -targetIntervals ${intervals} \
             -o ${sampleId}_realigned.bam 
        """

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

haplotypeCallerUnrecal.string_process:
process haplotypeCallerUnrecal {                                            
    
        cpus = 4                                                           
        memory = 16.GB                                                     
        time = '14h'                                                       
        publishDir "$params.outdir"                                        
        tag "$sampleId"                                                    
                                                                           
        input:                                                             
            path ref  from params.ref                                      
            path fai  from params.fai                                      
            path dict from params.dict                                     
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles) from realignedbam_ch       
                                                                           
        output:                                                            
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf")
                                                                                                                                              
        script:                                                            
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_CONFIDENT_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 30 \
             -o ${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24                                                 
        """                                                                
         
    }
haplotypeCallerUnrecal.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_CONFIDENT_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 30 \
             -o ${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24                                                 
        """

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

bqsrTable.string_process:
process bqsrTable {                                            
    
        cpus = 2
        memory = 12.GB                                                     
        time = '4h'                                                       
        publishDir "$params.outdir"                                        
        tag "$sampleId"                                                    
                                                                           
        input:                                                             
            path ref  from params.ref                                      
            path fai  from params.fai                                      
            path dict from params.dict                                     
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles), path(knownsites) from bsqr_ch      
                                                                        
        output:                                                            
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf.idx")
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_pre_recal.table")
                                                                           
        script:                                                            
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T BaseRecalibrator \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -knownSites ${knownsites} \
             -o ${sampleId}_pre_recal.table \
             -nt 1 -nct 24
        """                                                                
         
    }
bqsrTable.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T BaseRecalibrator \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -knownSites ${knownsites} \
             -o ${sampleId}_pre_recal.table \
             -nt 1 -nct 24
        """

tools_dico.description:

The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

recalibrateBQS.string_process:
process recalibrateBQS {                                            
    
        cpus = 3
        memory = 18.GB                                                     
        time = '3h'                                                       
        publishDir "$params.outdir", mode: 'move'
        tag "$sampleId"                                                    
                                                                           
        input:                                                             
            path ref  from params.ref                                      
            path fai  from params.fai                                      
            path dict from params.dict                                     
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles), path(table) from recal_ch      
                                                                        
        output:                                                            
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_recalibrated_reads.bam")
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_recalibrated_reads.bai")
                                                                           
        script:                                                            
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T PrintReads \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -BQSR ${table} \
             -o ${sampleId}_recalibrated_reads.bam \
             -nt 1 -nct 3
        """                                                                
         
    }
recalibrateBQS.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T PrintReads \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -BQSR ${table} \
             -o ${sampleId}_recalibrated_reads.bam \
             -nt 1 -nct 3
        """

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

callVariants.string_process:
process callVariants {                                            
    
        cpus = 4                                                           
        memory = 16.GB                                                     
        time = '14h'                                                       
        publishDir "$params.outdir", mode: 'move'
        tag "$sampleId"                                                    
                                                                           
        input:                                                             
            path ref  from params.ref                                      
            path fai  from params.fai                                      
            path dict from params.dict                                     
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles) from recalbam_ch       
                                                                           
        output:                                                            
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_raw_variants.vcf")
                                                                             

        script:                                                            
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 10 \
             -o ${sampleId}_raw_variants.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24                                                 
        """                                                                
         
    }
callVariants.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')    
        """                                                                
        module load gatk/3.8.1                                             
                                                                           
        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 10 \
             -o ${sampleId}_raw_variants.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24                                                 
        """

testIndelCh.string_process:
process testIndelCh {
    
        input:
            path ref  from params.ref                            
            path fai  from params.fai                            
            path dict from params.dict                           
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles), path(intervals) from realigntargets_ch
    
        script:
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1
    
        gatk -T IndelRealigner \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -targetIntervals ${intervals}
             -o ${sampleId}_realigned.bam 
        """
    }
testIndelCh.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1
    
        gatk -T IndelRealigner \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             -targetIntervals ${intervals}
             -o ${sampleId}_realigned.bam 
        """

testHapCallSingle.string_process:
process testHapCallSingle {
   
        cpus = 4
        memory = 16.GB
        time = '12h'
        publishDir "$params.outdir"
        tag "$sampleId"
 
        input:
            path ref  from params.ref 
            path fai  from params.fai 
            path dict from params.dict
            tuple val(sampleId), path(bamfiles) from realignedbam_ch

        output:
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf")

        script:
        def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_CONFIDENT_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 30 \
             -o ${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24 
        """
    }
testHapCallSingle.string_script:
def bam = bamfiles.findAll{ it.toString() =~ /.bam$/ }.join('')
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T HaplotypeCaller \
             -R ${ref} \
             -I ${bam} \
             --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY \
             --output_mode EMIT_ALL_CONFIDENT_SITES \
             -stand_call_conf 30 \
             -o ${sampleId}_unrecal_conf_sites.vcf \
             -nt 1 -nct 24 
        """

outputSNPs.string_process:
process outputSNPs {
   
        cpus = 4
        memory = 16.GB
        time = '2h'
        publishDir "$params.outdir"
        tag "$sampleId"
 
        input:
            path ref  from params.ref 
            path fai  from params.fai 
            path dict from params.dict
            tuple val(sampleId), path(rawVariants) from rawsnps_ch

        output:
            tuple val(sampleId), path("${sampleId}_raw_snps.vcf")

        script:
        """
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T SelectVariants \
             -R ${ref} \
             -V ${rawVariants} \
             -selectType SNP \
             -o ${sampleId}_raw_snps.vcf \
        """
    }
outputSNPs.string_script:
"""
        module load gatk/3.8.1

        gatk -T SelectVariants \
             -R ${ref} \
             -V ${rawVariants} \
             -selectType SNP \
             -o ${sampleId}_raw_snps.vcf \
        """

outputIndels.string_process:
